title: Pet population in Europe 2018 , by animal type
summary: This is a bar chart representing Pet Type in the x axis and Number of pets in thousands in the y axis.
Pet Type Cat has the highest Number of pets in thousands and Reptiles has the lowest Number of pets in thousands.
The highest Pet Type Cat has 95980.0 more Number of pets in thousands than the lowest Pet Type Reptiles.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of pets in thousands for 6 number of Pet Types.
The maximum Number of pets in thousands 103828.0 is found at Pet Type Cat and the minimum is found at Reptiles where Pet Type is 7848.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Pet Type in the x axis and Number of pets in thousands in the y axis.
Pet Type Cat has the highest Number of pets in thousands and Reptiles has the lowest Number of pets in thousands.
The highest Pet Type Cat has 95980.0 more Number of pets in thousands than the lowest Pet Type Reptiles.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Pet Type in the x axis and Number of pets in thousands in the y axis.
The Number of pets in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Pet Type Cat and lowest at Pet Type Reptiles.
Pet Type Dog has the second highest value for Number of pets in thousands.
The highest Pet Type Cat has 95980.0 more Number of pets in thousands than the lowest Pet Type Reptiles.
The Pet Type Cat has the highest Number of pets in thousands, followed by Dog, and Ornamental bird. Down to the Pet Type Reptiles which is the lowest.
The Pet Type Reptiles has 2.15 times less Number of pets in thousands than average.
The Number of pets in thousands is 289359.0 if we add up values of all Pet Types.
